description:
Next stop, everywhere. Or anywhere. In the Furrow Short, you don't need to make your mind up… you can just hit the road, stash your essentials, and let adventure take you where it may.

What makes this men's short so adaptable you ask? Well, let's start with its pocket game. It's got pockets at the front, back, and thigh, which means you get to stash all your "might needs" without a worry. It's also made from our favorite wonder crop, hemp, which delivers natural bacteria resistance along with quick-drying properties. It just happens to be wonderfully sustainable too.
name: Prana Furrow Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
